means: 把…一分为二，把…二等分( bisect的过去式 )

sentence.Network_en: The portals of the great western front are bisected by square pillars.
sentence.Network_cn: 正西那些大门都由方柱拦成两半.

sentence.Network_en: These lines are bisected by x - and t - axes.
sentence.Network_cn: 这些直线被x轴和t轴所等分.

sentence.Network_en: The landing aircraft had bisected their own runway.
sentence.Network_cn: 正在着陆的飞机从横里切过他们的跑道.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 一分为二的(bisected), 此释义来源于网络辞典。

list.abs: 两平面的交角angle bisection 角平分angle bisector 角平分线；分角线
bisected circle 圆圈内加一横bisecting point 中点bisector 等分线
bise 干冷风bisecting compasses 两脚规bisecting line 二等分线
bisect 平分；等分bisection method 分半法；分半方法bisector
bisect 平分；等分bisection method 分半法；分半方法bisector

entry.tran: 将…一分为二；把…分为两部分
entry.def: If something long and thin bisects an area or line, it divides the area or line in half.

example.ex: The main street bisects the town from end to end.
example.tran: 这条主干道把整个小镇一分为二。

auth_sentence.content: This week, he tweeted a picture of the Pacific bisected.
auth_sentence.res_content: This week, he tweeted a picture of the Pacific bisected.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: This week, he tweeted a picture of the Pacific bisected.

auth_sentence.content: The main focus was on a main road between the Mexican cities of Escarcega and Xpujil, which bisected the big cats' natural range.
auth_sentence.res_content: The main focus was on a main road between the Mexican cities of Escarcega and Xpujil, which bisected the big cats' natural range.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The main focus was on a main road between the Mexican cities of Escarcega and Xpujil, which bisected the big cats' natural range.

auth_sentence.content: Outlying shanties, spread across the city's arid plateau, gave way to a high-rise centre bisected with paved roads.
auth_sentence.res_content: Outlying shanties, spread across the city's arid plateau, gave way to a high-rise centre bisected with paved roads.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Outlying shanties, spread across the city's arid plateau, gave way to a high-rise centre bisected with paved roads.
